structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Distribution Of Limited Funds Of Estates To Parents Of Minors
law.text: A probate court may, upon application of an administrator or executor of an estate under such terms and conditions as the court may direct, authorize said person to deliver to the parent of a minor, any funds to which such minor is entitled and held by said administrator or executor when the sum is less than one thousand dollars.
